content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Resource Depot & Smelting Facility at base position (x=-4.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-4.5, y=18.5), serving as the central storage depot.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-3.0, y=19.0), used for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-4.0, y=21.0), used for processing copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_FUEL; warning: ["out of fuel"]).

### Automation Lab & Steam Power System (Integrated System)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (x=-7.5, y=18.5), used for automation research.
- Boiler at position (x=-5.5, y=24.0), used for generating steam (status: NO_FUEL; warning: ["out of fuel"]).
- Generator (Steam Engine) at position (x=-0.5, y=24.5), converting steam into electrical power (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]).
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-7.5, y=25.5), supplying water.
- Electricity Group composed of small electric poles at positions (x=-0.5, y=11.5), (x=-4.5, y=15.5), (x=0.5, y=14.5), (x=-5.5, y=18.5), (x=-8.5, y=21.5) and (x=-2.5, y=24.5) (voltage: 33).
- Pipe Groups forming the fluid network:
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1584) at position (x=-10.5, y=16.5) with pipes at positions (x=-10.5, y=16.5), (x=-9.5, y=17.5), (x=-9.5, y=16.5), (x=-9.5, y=19.5) and (x=-9.5, y=18.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1585) at position (x=-12.5, y=18.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1587) at position (x=-8.5, y=20.5) with pipes at positions (x=-8.5, y=20.5), (x=-7.5, y=21.5), (x=-7.5, y=20.5), (x=-7.5, y=23.5), (x=-7.5, y=22.5) and (x=-7.5, y=24.5) (status: FULL_OUTPUT).
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1589) at position (x=-2.5, y=21.5) with pipes at positions (x=-2.5, y=21.5), (x=-1.5, y=21.5) and (x=-0.5, y=21.5) (status: EMPTY).

### Copper Cable Factory at position (x=1.5, y=19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- AssemblingMachine1 at position (x=1.5, y=19.5), configured with the copper-cable recipe (status: NO_POWER; warnings: ["not receiving electricity"]).
- Small Electric Pole at position (x=3.5, y=19.5), placed to connect the assembler to the power network.
- Additional Small Electric Pole at position (x=-0.5, y=19.5), added to further improve power connectivity.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
- AssemblingMachine1 Placement Failures:
  • Ensure the target build area is free of obstructions and collisions. Verify adequate spacing and adjust placement direction to avoid interference with existing structures.
  
- Recipe Setting Errors:
  • Confirm that the deployed assembler’s reference is correctly assigned before attempting to set recipes to avoid undefined variable issues.
  
- Nearest Buildable Area Search Issues:
  • Always treat position objects as data and ensure that any computed center positions are defined and accessible rather than mistakenly invoking them as functions.

- Ingredient Supply Timing Error:
  • The recurring warning "cannot create copper-cable due to missing resources: copper-plate (1)" indicates delays in supplying the required ingredient. Synchronize copper plate extraction and reinsertion to ensure the assembler’s input inventory is promptly replenished.

- Power Connectivity Issues:
  • Persistent "not receiving electricity" warnings—even after adding additional electric poles—suggest connection lapses. Re-examine the electrical grid integration and validate that the newly placed poles are correctly connected to a functioning power network.
